successes.title: Marauder Task Force Gaming Figures
successes.description: Marauder Task Force is a gaming figure “system” for Sci-Fi, Military, and  Superhero gaming enthusiasts.

Pledges.description: Ensign Level: Our SINCEREST thanks for your support!

Lieutenant Level: "Desert-Ops" - Receive 1 (one)  DESERT-OPS MARAUDER Gaming figure.  Featuring special desert themed paint scheme & accessories.  US orders ship FREE.  International buyers please add $7 for shipping.

Lieutenant Level: "Night-Ops" - Receive 1 (one)  NIGHT-OPS MARAUDER Gaming figure.  Featuring special night camo themed design & accessories.  US orders ship FREE.  International buyers please add $7 for shipping.

Lieutenant Level: "Urban-Ops" - Receive 1 (one)  URBAN-OPS MARAUDER Gaming figure.  Featuring special urban themed paint scheme & accessories.  US orders ship FREE.  International buyers please add $7 for shipping.

Squad Commander Level- Special 3 (three) figure set. Receive 1 (one)  DESERT-OPS MARAUDER Gaming figure, 1 (one)  NIGHT-OPS MARAUDER Gaming figure and 1 (one) URBAN-OPS MARAUDER Gaming figure (3 total figures).  Each figure features special  themed paint scheme & accessories. Squad Commander level participants can purchase ADDITIONAL stretch goal bonus items.  US orders ship FREE.  International buyers please add $12 for shipping.

Captain Level- Special 6 (SIX) figure set. Receive 2 (two)  DESERT-OPS MARAUDER Gaming figures, 2 (two)  NIGHT-OPS MARAUDER Gaming figures and 2 (two) URBAN-OPS MARAUDER Gaming figures (6 total figures).  Each figure features special  themed paint scheme & accessories.
Commodore level participants get 1 (ONE) of EACH stretch goal bonus  added for FREE to their packages AND can purchase ADDITIONAL stretch goal bonus items.
US orders ship FREE.  International buyers please add $18 for shipping.

Squad Commander "URBAN-OPS" Level- Special 3 (three) figure set. Receive 3 (THREE) URBAN-OPS MARAUDER Gaming figures. Each figure features special themed paint scheme & accessories. Squad Commander "Urban-Ops"  level participants can purchase ADDITIONAL stretch goal bonus items. US orders ship FREE. International buyers please add $12 for shipping.

Squad Commander "NIGHT-OPS" Level- Special 3 (three) figure set. Receive 3 (THREE) NIGHT-OPS MARAUDER Gaming figures. Each figure features special themed paint scheme & accessories. Squad Commander "Night-Ops"  level participants can purchase ADDITIONAL stretch goal bonus items. US orders ship FREE. International buyers please add $12 for shipping.

Squad Commander "DESERT-OPS" Level- Special 3 (three) figure set. Receive 3 (THREE) DESERT-OPS MARAUDER Gaming figures. Each figure features special themed paint scheme & accessories. Squad Commander "Desert-Ops" level participants can purchase ADDITIONAL stretch goal bonus items. US orders ship FREE. International buyers please add $12 for shipping.

Captain Level- Special 6 (SIX) figure set. Receive 2 (two)  DESERT-OPS MARAUDER Gaming figures, 2 (two)  NIGHT-OPS MARAUDER Gaming figures and 2 (two) URBAN-OPS MARAUDER Gaming figures (6 total figures).  Each figure features special  themed paint scheme & accessories.
Captain level participants can purchase ADDITIONAL stretch goal bonus items.
US orders ship FREE.  International buyers please add $18 for shipping.

Captain Level "DESERT-OPS" - Special 6 (SIX) figure set. Receive 6 (SIX) DESERT-OPS MARAUDER Gaming figures. Each figure features special themed paint scheme & accessories. Captain "Desert-Ops"  level participants can purchase ADDITIONAL stretch goal bonus items. US orders ship FREE. International buyers please add $18 for shipping.

Captain Level "URBAN-OPS" - Special 6 (SIX) figure set. Receive 6 (SIX) URBAN-OPS MARAUDER Gaming figures. Each figure features special themed paint scheme & accessories. Captain "Urban-Ops"  level participants can purchase ADDITIONAL stretch goal bonus items. US orders ship FREE. International buyers please add $18 for shipping.

Captain Level "NIGHT-OPS" - Special 6 (SIX) figure set. Receive 6 (SIX) NIGHT-OPS MARAUDER Gaming figures. Each figure features special themed paint scheme & accessories. Captain "Night-Ops"  level participants can purchase ADDITIONAL stretch goal bonus items. US orders ship FREE. International buyers please add $18 for shipping.

Captain Level- Special 6 (SIX) figure set. Receive 2 (two) DESERT-OPS MARAUDER Gaming figures, 2 (two) NIGHT-OPS MARAUDER Gaming figures and 2 (two) URBAN-OPS MARAUDER Gaming figures (6 total figures). Each figure features special themed paint scheme & accessories. Captain level participants can purchase ADDITIONAL stretch goal bonus items. US orders ship FREE. International buyers please add $18 for shipping.
NOTE: this is the SAME "Captain Level" 6 figure set that is shown as "sold out", but there was a typo error with the avail date (it is and has always been December 2014, not May 2014)

Commodore Level- Special 12 (TWELVE) figure set.  Receive 4 (four) DESERT-OPS MARAUDER Gaming figures, 4 (four) NIGHT-OPS MARAUDER Gaming figures and 4 (four) URBAN-OPS MARAUDER Gaming figures (12 total figures). Each figure features special themed paint scheme & accessories.   If ANY stretch goals are reached, Commodore level participants will have 1 (ONE) of EACH stretch goal bonus reward sets added for FREE to their packages AND will be able to purchase as many ADDITIONAL stretch goal bonus reward sets as desired. US orders ship FREE. International buyers please add $25 for shipping.

Admiral Level- Special 27 (TWENTY-SEVEN) figure set. Receive 9 (NINE) DESERT-OPS MARAUDER Gaming figures, 9 (NINE) NIGHT-OPS MARAUDER Gaming figures and 9 (NINE) URBAN-OPS MARAUDER Gaming figures (27 total figures). Each figure features special themed paint scheme & accessories. If ANY stretch goals are reached, Admiral level participants will have 2 (TWO) of EACH stretch goal bonus reward sets added for FREE to their packages AND will be able to purchase as many ADDITIONAL stretch goal bonus reward sets as desired. US orders ship FREE. International buyers please add $40 for shipping.
